Headline: #201 Central/Ridge Temporary Reroute at Central/Ashland
ShortDescription: 201 Central/Ridge  buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Asbury, Lincoln, Green Bay, and Central, due to, street blockage near Central/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#201 Central/Ridge  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Asbury, Lincoln, Green Bay, and Central, due to, street blockage near Central/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
